properties.title: Apple Hardware Test Finder
properties.build: /Users/Maxim/Desktop/Apple Hardware Test Finder 1.1/Apple Hardware Test Finder 1.1.mpkg

pkmkdoc.description: Batch script that determines your specific Mac system and outputs one or more download links for the right version of Apple Hardware Test

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf360 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Hello there!\ \ This installer will install the Apple Hardware Test Finder in your Applications folder.\ \ Thank you for trying it out!\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ Source code and additional documentation is available on GitHub: https://github.com/MaxTechnics/AHTFinder}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf360 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 And you're done!\ \ To run, open Terminal and type\ /Applications/AHTFinder/AHTFinder.sh\ \ You can also run the .sh file by setting macOS to open .sh files with Terminal on double click.\ To do this, right-click AHTFinder.sh and click Terminal in the 'Open With...' menu.\ \ To uninstall:\ Delete the AHTFinder directory in /Applications\ Those are the only files being installed.\ \ \ \ Have a wonderful day!}

requirement.message: Sorry, but you don't have enough space left on your Disk. Try emptying the trash and free up at least 1mb of space and try again. You can do it!
